title: Regal Diamond Emerald Haaram: A Timeless Statement of Elegance
materials: featuring vibrant Emerald and Ruby accents. The gold boasts a lustrous Hyderabadi polish
features: This stunning haaram features a regal, multi-layered design. The diamond-encrusted layers culminate in a intricately detailed pendant, enhanced with emerald and ruby accents. Delicate gold drops add movement and charm. The design blends traditional Indian craftsmanship with modern aesthetic sensibilities.
colors: Primarily gold with dazzling white diamonds
punctuated by vibrant green emeralds and a subtle touch of red rubies. This classic color combination exudes opulence and sophistication.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaaham)
or any celebration where you want to make a lasting impression. This piece will become an heirloom treasure.
description: This haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship and a testament to timeless elegance. The meticulous setting of the diamonds, combined with the rich color palette and traditional design elements, makes it a truly unique and valuable piece.
